subject: lost package
description_text:
Hi I’m just wanting to know why my order has not arrived as on your website it dates upto 15 days for delivery it has been 16 days already and I still have not received the item. When I look at the tracking it says it’s still in china.

Please update asap.

Oder number  #ssn4858
ORDER #SSN4858

conversations.body_text: Hi Ethan Boehm,     We have updated the tracking number. Please check the latest shipping information.
